unnormalised: Payment gateways, the real MVP of e-commerce! Remember the days of COD and endlessly waiting for "Raju from Blue Dart"?
normalised: Payment gateways, the real M V P of e-commerce! Remember the days of C O D and endlessly waiting for "Raju from Blue Dart"?

unnormalised: Now, thanks to these wizards, I can buy that Kanjeevaram saree for my sister's wedding in Chennai during Onam from my phone while eating biryani.
normalised: Now, thanks to these wizards, I can buy that Kanjeevaram saree for my sister's wedding in Chennai during Onam from my phone while eating biryani.

unnormalised: Rs. 50 convenience fee? Worth it! Just hope their servers don't crash during the Diwali sales rush. Namaste, technology!
normalised: rupee fifty convenience fee? Worth it! Just hope their servers don't crash during the Diwali sales rush. Namaste, technology!
